entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a person who has spoken to the students. She is described as saying 'We have already placed protection around the castle' and asking the students to move quickly and calmly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is looking for Ron and Hermione. He is described as moving up the Hall alongside the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person that Harry is looking for.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person that Harry is looking for.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindors are mentioned as one of the houses in the school. They are described as erupting with a great cheer when Professor McGonagall says 'He has, to use the common phrase, done a bunk'.
